titles.title: A joint resolution to designate the visitors center at the Channel Islands National Park, California, as the "Robert J. Lagomarsino Visitors Center".

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S15945)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held.

committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

bill.summary: 11/17/1993--Introduced. Designates the visitors center at Channel Islands National Park, California, as the Robert J. Lagomarsino Visitors Center.
